New Records: Albania scored the fastest goal in Euros history
Key Match Events: Klaus Gjasula scored a stoppage-time equalizer after his own goal
Andrej Kramaric scored a goal for Croatia

Pre-Game Insights: Croatia were expected to win based on their current form
